summary: Working on the 3rd release of my mod, now working properly on each piece of equipment instead on working thru set by set, since the game recognizes and deals better with each piece instead of whole set.
descriptionHtml:
WORK IN PROGRESS MOD:

[b]LIGHT BOOTS[/b]
[color=green]DONE[/color] - 9 new Light Boots.
[color=green]DONE[/color] - Light Boots world insertion. (craft/levellist)
[color=green]DONE[/color] - Light Boots advancements. (temper/enchants)
[b]HEAVY BOOTS[/b]
[color=green]DONE[/color] - 8 new Light Boots.
[color=green]DONE[/color] - Light Boots world insertion. (craft/levellist)
[color=red]NOTY[/color] - Light Boots advancements. (temper/enchants)

[b]ONGOING PERMISSION/CREDITS[/b]
Before someone complains, I will be listing here all modders that supports Armonizer project and what is being used of each:

OmegaRed99: Brown, Corumdum, Knight and Champion Boots.
frankdema: Explorer, Hunter and Ranger Boots.
LordofShadows: Marauder and Strider Boots.
Teh-Husky: Ringmail Boots.
ActusReus: Reinforced and Dark Plates Boots.
mancika: Paladin Plates Boots
author: Ketaroz
